PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-14222010-11-18,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1573 - Food Additive)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1573 - Food Additive) in order to enable the use of Carnobacterium maltaromaticum CB1 in vacuum-packed hot dogs as well as certain pre-sliced deli meats and can contribute to reducing Listeria monocytogenes growth.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0264 Publication Date: 2010-12-08
